title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: The SaveAs feature is forgetting the file type and the icon has changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: After using the SaveAs feature, the file is showing a generic file icon and opening it reveals that the file is opened as text.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file unless explicitly changed.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the file
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save icon
4) A dialog box will appear
5) Browse for a valid destination
6) Type the filename without specifying the extension
7) Click OK

Observe that the file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, but without a file extension displayed.
